title: Nancy Drew ePub
description:
Here is a copy of 1 to 56 of the Nancy Drew in ePub. I found them in Microsoft word and converted to epub. 

If not the right format download 
 <a href="
http://calibre-ebook.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://calibre-ebook.com/</a>

and convert to desired format.

#2: The Hidden Staircase
